# include <cstdio>
# include <iostream>
# include <algorithm>
# include <vector>
# include <cstring>
# include <cctype>
# include <set>
# include <map>
# include <cmath>
# include <queue>
# include <string>
 
using namespace std;
 
vector<int> adjlist[500];
char seen[500];
 
int dfs(int u)
{
	seen[u]=1;
	int ret=1;
	for(int i=0;i<adjlist[u].size();i++)
		if(!seen[adjlist[u][i]])ret+=dfs(adjlist[u][i]);
	return ret;
}
 
int main()
{
	int T;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	for(int t=1;t<=T;t++)
	{
		int N,M;
		scanf("%d%d",&N,&M);
		
		for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
		{
			adjlist[i].clear();
			seen[i]=0;
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<M;i++)
		{
			int a,b;
			scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
			adjlist[a].push_back(b);
			adjlist[b].push_back(a);
		}
		
		int ret=0,ones=0;
		for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
		{
			if(seen[i])continue;
			int sz=dfs(i);
			ret+=(sz*(sz-1))>>1;
			if(sz==1)ones++;
		}
		ret+=(ones*(ones-1))>>1;
		printf("%d\n",ret);
	}
	return 0;
}
